description:
RØDE Connect allows you to connect up to four guests using a wide range of compatible RØDE microphones and interfaces, and then mix, process, record and stream your audio.

RØDE Connect is a simple, powerful and free software solution for podcasting and livestreaming.
It allows you to connect up to four guests using a wide range of compatible RØDE microphones and interfaces, and then mix, process, record and stream your audio.

Compatible RØDE products include:
- AI-Micro
- NT-USB Mini
- NT-USB+
- NT1 5th Generation
- PodMic USB
- VideoMic GO II
- VideoMic NTG
- Wireless ME
- Wireless GO II
- Wireless PRO
